thought: To craft an emerald block, I need to place 9 emeralds in a 3x3 square in the crafting grid. The first emerald is at slot 31, so I will move it to slot 1 (the top left corner of the crafting grid).
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
